title: ayyA nan
sahitya:
ayyA nAn unran aDiyuraiyallavO AdarittiDuvAyE


anupallavi

  sheyyAL pati magizh shevvET-kumaranE meyyAL patinudal vizhikkanal uruvOnE


caraNam    nalivelAm aghaTriyE nallaruL purivAi nambinEn nIyE ennandA dIpamAm 
kaliyuga varadanE kalApa mayUranE kazhaliNai piDittEn karuNAnidhiyE
